verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> spake יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

דַּבֵּ֣ר ׀ <WH1696> Speak אֶל־ <WH413> to בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> of Israel וְקַ֣ח <WH3947> and take מֵֽאִתָּ֡ם <WH853> מַטֶּ֣ה <WH4294> rods מַטֶּה֩ <WH4294> upon his rod לְבֵ֨ית <WH1004> according to the house אָ֜ב <WH1> of [their] fathers מֵאֵ֤ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all נְשִֽׂיאֵהֶם֙ <WH5387> of all their princes לְבֵ֣ית <WH1004> according to the house אֲבֹתָ֔ם <WH1> of their fathers שְׁנֵ֥ים <WH8147> both עָשָׂ֖ר <WH6240> ten מַטּ֑וֹת <WH4294> his rod אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> thou every man's אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁמ֔וֹ <WH8034> name תִּכְתֹּ֖ב <WH3789> write עַל־ <WH5921> and מַטֵּֽהוּ׃ <WH4294> rods

וְאֵת֙ <WH853> שֵׁ֣ם <WH8034> name אַהֲרֹ֔ן <WH175> Aaron's תִּכְתֹּ֖ב <WH3789> And thou shalt write עַל־ <WH5921> on מַטֵּ֣ה <WH4294> upon the rod לֵוִ֑י <WH3878> of Levi כִּ֚י <WH3588> for מַטֶּ֣ה <WH4294> rod אֶחָ֔ד <WH259> for one לְרֹ֖אשׁ <WH7218> [shall be] for the head בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> of the house אֲבוֹתָֽם׃ <WH1> of their fathers

וְהִנַּחְתָּ֖ם <WH3240> And thou shalt lay them up בְּאֹ֣הֶל <WH168> in the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֑ד <WH4150> of the congregation לִפְנֵי֙ <WH6440> before הָֽעֵד֔וּת <WH5715> the testimony אֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> I אִוָּעֵ֥ד <WH3259> where I will meet לָכֶ֖ם שָֽׁמָּה׃ <WH8033> It

וְהָיָ֗ה <WH1961> will come הָאִ֛ישׁ <WH376> And it shall come to pass [that] the man's אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> whom אֶבְחַר־ <WH977> whom I shall choose בּ֖וֹ מַטֵּ֣הוּ <WH4294> rod יִפְרָ֑ח <WH6524> shall blossom וַהֲשִׁכֹּתִ֣י <WH7918> and I will make to cease מֵֽעָלַ֗י <WH5921> against אֶת־ <WH853> תְּלֻנּוֹת֙ <WH8519> from me the murmurings בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel אֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> who הֵ֥ם <WH1992> like מַלִּינִ֖ם <WH3885> whereby they murmur עֲלֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH5921> against

וַיְדַבֵּ֨ר <WH1696> spake מֹשֶׁ֜ה <WH4872> And Moses אֶל־ <WH413> to בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> of Israel וַיִּתְּנ֣וּ <WH5414> gave אֵלָ֣יו ׀ <WH413> and כָּֽל־ <WH3605> all נְשִֽׂיאֵיהֶ֡ם <WH5387> and every one of their princes מַטֶּה֩ <WH4294> rods לְנָשִׂ֨יא <WH5387> leader אֶחָ֜ד <WH259> apiece מַטֶּ֨ה <WH4294> and the rod לְנָשִׂ֤יא <WH5387> their leaders אֶחָד֙ <WH259> each לְבֵ֣ית <WH1004> houses אֲבֹתָ֔ם <WH1> according to their fathers' שְׁנֵ֥ים <WH8147> both עָשָׂ֖ר <WH6240> ten מַטּ֑וֹת <WH4294> their rods וּמַטֵּ֥ה <WH4294> their rods אַהֲרֹ֖ן <WH175> of Aaron בְּת֥וֹךְ <WH8432> [was] among מַטּוֹתָֽם׃ <WH4294> the rod

וַיַּנַּ֥ח <WH3240> laid up מֹשֶׁ֛ה <WH4872> And Moses אֶת־ <WH853> הַמַּטֹּ֖ת <WH4294> the rods לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD בְּאֹ֖הֶל <WH168> in the tabernacle הָעֵדֻֽת׃ <WH5715> of witness

וַיְהִ֣י <WH1961> become מִֽמָּחֳרָ֗ת <WH4283> And it came to pass that on the morrow וַיָּבֹ֤א <WH935> went מֹשֶׁה֙ <WH4872> Moses אֶל־ <WH413> into אֹ֣הֶל <WH168> into the tabernacle הָעֵד֔וּת <WH5715> of witness וְהִנֵּ֛ה <WH2009> and behold פָּרַ֥ח <WH6524> was budded מַטֵּֽה־ <WH4294> and behold the rod אַהֲרֹ֖ן <WH175> of Aaron לְבֵ֣ית <WH1004> for the house לֵוִ֑י <WH3878> of Levi וַיֹּ֤צֵֽא <WH3318> and brought forth פֶ֙רַח֙ <WH6525> buds וַיָּ֣צֵֽץ <WH6692> and bloomed צִ֔יץ <WH6731> blossoms וַיִּגְמֹ֖ל <WH1580> and yielded שְׁקֵדִֽים׃ <WH8247> almonds

וַיֹּצֵ֨א <WH3318> brought out מֹשֶׁ֤ה <WH4872> And Moses אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַמַּטֹּת֙ <WH4294> all the rods מִלִּפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> from before יְהוָ֔ה <WH3069> God אֶֽל־ <WH413> to כָּל־ <WH3605> all בְּנֵ֖י <WH1121> unto all the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel וַיִּרְא֥וּ <WH7200> and they looked וַיִּקְח֖וּ <WH3947> and took אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> every man מַטֵּֽהוּ׃ <WH4294> his rod ס

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֗ה <WH4872> unto Moses הָשֵׁ֞ב <WH7725> again אֶת־ <WH853> מַטֵּ֤ה <WH4294> rod אַהֲרֹן֙ <WH175> Aaron's לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before הָעֵד֔וּת <WH5715> the testimony לְמִשְׁמֶ֥רֶת <WH4931> to be kept לְא֖וֹת <WH226> for a token לִבְנֵי־ <WH1121> against מֶ֑רִי <WH4805> the rebels וּתְכַ֧ל <WH3615> and thou shalt quite take away תְּלוּנֹּתָ֛ם <WH8519> their murmurings מֵעָלַ֖י <WH5921> and וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> they will not יָמֻֽתוּ׃ <WH4191> from me that they die

וַיַּ֖עַשׂ <WH6213> did מֹשֶׁ֑ה <WH4872> And Moses כַּאֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> after צִוָּ֧ה <WH6680> commanded יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> [so] as the LORD אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> כֵּ֥ן <WH3651> so עָשָֽׂה׃ <WH6213> him so did ס

וַיֹּֽאמְרוּ֙ <WH559> spake בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֖ה <WH4872> unto Moses לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying הֵ֥ן <WH2005> Behold גָּוַ֛עְנוּ <WH1478> Behold we die אָבַ֖דְנוּ <WH6> we perish כֻּלָּ֥נוּ <WH3605> are all אָבָֽדְנוּ׃ <WH6> we all perish

כֹּ֣ל <WH3605> Everyone הַקָּרֵ֧ב ׀ <WH7131> Whosoever cometh any thing near הַקָּרֵ֛ב <WH7131> near אֶל־ <WH413> to מִשְׁכַּ֥ן <WH4908> unto the tabernacle יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD יָמ֑וּת <WH4191> shall die הַאִ֥ם <WH518> lo תַּ֖מְנוּ <WH8552> shall we be consumed לִגְוֹֽעַ׃ <WH1478> with dying ס
